item.description:
https://www.facebook.com/ical/event.php?eid=140878976026420

Chinese Historical Society of New England · By Nancy Eng

WhenSaturday, January 28, 2012 Time2:00pm until 4:00pm

Where Boston Chinatown Neighberhood Center (BCNC)

38 Ash Street, Boston

Phone: 617 635-5129

(try to call and let them know you are coming, not sure rsvp limit or rsvp at facebook event link above.)

Description Lecture on the emergence of middle class Chinese America by Columbia University Professor Mae Ngai, award-winning author of The Lucky Ones, One Family and the Extraordinary Invention of Chinese America. Funded in part by Mass Humanities & the Wang Foundation. Co-sponsored by Boston Chinatown Neighborhood Center.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: CHSNE 20th Anniversary Lecture with Mae Ngai, Author of The Lucky Ones
